hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x -e
cat > site.conf <<EOF # u-boot-edm.bb SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-edm = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-u-boot-edm = "tn-imx_v2018.03_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-edm = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-u-boot-edm = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-u-boot-edm = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# u-boot-script.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-script = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-script = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw"
# linux-firmware-brcm-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/brcm_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "master" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-firmware-qca-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/qca_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "caf-wlan/CNSS.LEA.NRT_3.0" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-tn-imx.bb KERNEL_SRC_pn-linux-tn-imx = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/tn-kernel.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "tn-imx_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-tn-imx = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-tn-imx = "08f904851abfca07fabbbf49fd3e1a47e50a7ee5" SRC_URI_pn-linux-tn-imx = "\${KERNEL_SRC};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# afloader.bb TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR_pn-afloader = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/fpga/afloader.git" SRCOPTIONS_pn-afloader = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRC_URI_pn-afloader = "\${TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# axonfabric-firmware.bb TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR_pn-axonfabric-firmware = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/fpga/axonfabric-firmware.git" SRCOPTIONS_pn-axonfabric-firmware = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRC_URI_pn-axonfabric-firmware = "\${TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
EOF

#!/bin/bash -x -e
OUTDIR=/home/jenkins/build/boot2qt-images CACHEDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.5/cache DLDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.5/downloads SSTATEDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.5/sstate-cache
# clear and make download/sstate-cache/ccache folder on external volume [ -d ${WORKSPACE}/sources/meta-edm-bsp-release ] && rm -fR ${WORKSPACE}/sources/meta-edm-bsp-release
GITSERVER="10.20.30.20" GITMIRROR="10.88.88.8" chmod 0600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa ssh-keyscan ${GITSERVER} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts ssh-keyscan ${GITMIRROR} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
CONFs=("pico-imx8mq" "pico-imx8mm" "pico-imx7" "pico-imx6" "flex-imx8mm" "edm-imx8mq" "edm-imx7" "edm-imx6")
# setup environment variables for building, e.g. # BASEBOARDs=("pi" "nymph" "dwarf" "hobbit") # DISPLAYs=("lvds7" "hdmi720p" "hdmi1080p" "lcd" "lvds7_hdmi720p") # WLANs=("qca" "brcm" "ath-pci") setup_env_vars () { case $1 in pico-imx8mq) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; pico-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; edm-imx8mq) board="wizard" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; flex-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; axon-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" panel="ili9881c" ;; pico-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; pico-imx7) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; pico-imx6ul) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; edm-imx6) board="fairy" disp="lvds7" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; axon-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; edm-imx7) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" panel="" ;; tep1-imx7) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" panel="" ;; tep1-imx6ul) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" panel="" ;; tek-imx6) board="tek" disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" panel="" ;; tek3-imx6ul) board="tek" disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" panel="" ;; *) ;; esac }
# update ./conf/local.conf setting setup_local_conf () { CURDIR=.
# setup conf/local.conf if grep "^DL_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^DL_DIR.*|DL_DIR = "'$DLDIR'"|g' -i $CURDIR/conf/local.conf else echo "DL_DIR = \"$DLDIR\"" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf fi if grep "^SSTATE_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^SSTATE_DIR.*|SSTATE_DIR = "'$SSTATEDIR'"|g' -i $CURDIR/conf/local.conf else echo "SSTATE_DIR = \"$SSTATEDIR\"" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf fi
echo "INHERIT += \"rm_work\"" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf echo "INHERIT += \"image-buildinfo\"" >> $CURDIR/conf/local.conf unset CURDIR }
for conf in ${CONFs[*]}; do cd ${WORKSPACE}
./sources/meta-boot2qt/b2qt-init-build-env init --device $conf
unset MACHINE export MACHINE=$conf source setup-environment.sh
setup_env_vars $conf setup_local_conf
# Export uEnv.txt variables export BASE_BOARD=$board export DISPLAY_INFO=$disp export RF_FIRMWARES=$wlan export DISPLAY_PANEL=$panel export BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE="$BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE BASE_BOARD DISPLAY_INFO RF_FIRMWARES DISPLAY_PANEL" export
# Copy the site.conf for overriding QCA firmware downloads cp ${WORKSPACE}/site.conf ./conf/site.conf cat ./conf/site.conf
#bitbake u-boot-edm -c cleanall #bitbake linux-tn-imx -c cleanall #bitbake meta-b2qt-embedded-qbsp -c cleanall bitbake meta-b2qt-embedded-qbsp
done
